1.title: DNA (Alex Metric Remix)
1.description: Singles Buffet highlights new music worth your time. Dig in to a smorgasbord of different musical tastes. And let us know what you’re liking best in the comments section or on our Facebook...

2.title: Street Of Dreams

3.title: Call My Name
3.description: Welcome to Wednesday and a brand new round of The Jam Jar! We’re halfway through the week and beginning to reach the point of unfocused excitement for the weekend to come, so in preparation we’ve got a big list of tunes to get spinning. This week has the

4.title: Daddy's Money
4.sitename: MCL: Musique au Claire de Lune
4.description: Parlons peu mais parlons bien ! Hier j'ai découvert une jeune pousse au talent incontestable : Johnny Stimson, de son nom d'artiste, n'a proposé pour l'instant que deux titres sur son soundcloud mais ce sont deux hits en puissance ! De la Dance Pop brilla

5.title: DNA (Calvin Harris Remix) CLIP
5.description: Empire Of The Sun conquered the suburbs in their epic “DNA” video and now the Australian duo has their sights set on taking clubland — courtesy of a lush remix by EDM king Calvin Harris. The Scot stays remarkably true to the moody original. His remix is s

6.title: Falling (produced by Robin Hannibal)
6.description: Given the release of both the Croods soundtrack duet “Shine Your Way” with Owl City and her springtime Sixth Street EP, it’s been a busy year for Yuna — and she’s not done keeping her fans supplied with fresh material just yet. The 26-year-old Malaysian s

7.title: Romanticise
7.description: Sunday Morning Medicine is a feature from Dancing Astronaut dedicated to the mellower side of electronic music. We bring you our favorite therapeutic selections — old and new — in an attempt to alleviate the agonizing effects of a long weekend of partying

8.title: I See You (Bit Funk Remix)
8.description: A bit of summery smoothness to ease our way back into the week. I can’t believe Labor Day is right around the corner. I don’t want it to end.

9.title: Stay With Us
9.description: Seoul - Stay With Us Have you ever sat on a crowded train listening to a beautiful track and found yourself transported to your happy place, no longer surrounded by coughing and sneezing business people in collars and ties? It happens to me all the time.

10.title: Let Go
10.description: It’s not often a band makes such an impact with a debut track, but Glastonbury-based shimmer-pop quartet Dive In have done just that with this slice of floaty, escapist pop. Starting with plinking, beach-washed piano and statement synths, ‘Let Go’ hints t

11.title: Minnesota, WI (Oliver Nelson Remix)
11.description: We can never go past an Oliver Nelson remix and this one of Bon Iver is just exquisite. Whilst we’ve been championing all things Oliver Nelson in recent times, this 12 month old remix has crept up on us. Earbliss folks. Pure earbliss. The more attention O

12.title: Burn (At Dawn We Rage Light It Up Remix)
12.description: At Dawn We Rage killed this remix. Seriously. Just. Killed. It. The 100,000 plays they’ve gotten in the past week is a testament to that – it builds slowly with Ellie’s vocal before subtly dropping into melodic trap. By melding big festival noises (airy p

13.title: Technicolor (Original)

16.title: Trying To Be Cool (A-Trak Remix)

17.title: Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood (Zeds Dead Remix)

18.title: I Need Your Love (R3hab Remix)

19.title: Sonnentanz (Sun Don't Shine Version feat. Will Heard)
19.description: Cette semaine, on vous propose une succesion de morceaux plus addictifs que jamais. Et ça commence...
